## Feature Description

## Use Case

Describe the use case or problem this feature would solve.

**Example**: "As a developer working in an airgapped environment, I need to be able to download models offline so that I can use Acode without internet access."

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you envision this feature working.

Include details about:

- Configuration options
- Expected behavior

Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.
